channel.title: Comments on: SSRS Properties – Columns
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: mahtab
item.dc:creator: mahtab
item.description: Hi,I Do All Of this but in PDF Render I cannot See Multi Column and i see single Column Yet Can u Help Me?
item.content:encoded: Hi,I Do All Of this but in PDF Render I cannot See Multi Column and i see single Column Yet Can u Help Me?

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: Luca, no, I'm sorry, I don't know how to do that.
item.content:encoded: Luca, no, I’m sorry, I don’t know how to do that.

item.title: By: Luca
item.dc:creator: Luca
item.description: Hi, i'm looking for a way to print data horizontally. Can you help me?
item.content:encoded: Hi, i’m looking for a way to print data horizontally. Can you help me?

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: Greg - yes, great point. A print preview or exporting will render it correctly.
item.content:encoded: Greg – yes, great point. A print preview or exporting will render it correctly.

item.title: By: Greg Low
item.dc:creator: Greg Low
item.description: In most versions of SSRS, the "Print Preview" button will show you the layout, even though the standard preview doesn't.
item.content:encoded: In most versions of SSRS, the “Print Preview” button will show you the layout, even though the standard preview doesn’t.
